About Us

The Mark is an online-only webstore that offers a curated selection of vintage Italian furniture, lighting, and accessories from the 60s, 70s, and 80s. Founded by Italian design specialist Mattia Nuzzo, the unique collection highlights exceptional pieces that demonstrate timeless qualities of innovation and craftsmanship. Located in Los Angeles, The Mark will assist with domestic and international shipping and packaging. Local customers please inquire about memoing or renting specific items.
